cloudsim.ext.datacenter
Class DatacenterController

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      eduni.simjava.Sim_entity
          gridsim.GridSimCore
              cloudsim.CloudSim
                  cloudsim.DatacenterBroker
                      cloudsim.ext.datacenter.DatacenterController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constants, CloudsimObservable, GeoLocatable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Runnable
public class DatacenterController
extends cloudsim.DatacenterBroker
implements GeoLocatable, CloudsimObservable, Constants

DataCenterController is responsible for managing a single Data Center (DataCenter). It extends DatacenterBroker and overrides some of the default behaviour to be responsible only for managing a single data center.

Author:
Bhathiya Wickremasinghe

Method Detail

body

public void body()
Handles external events that are coming to this DatacenterBroker entity. This method also queries GridInformationService about available datacenters.
